pages.text: Prepare for trouble... And make it double!

Nighthawk consists of two old ships that always travel together. Each one is powered by a dual water wheel and 6 oars, needing a crew of at least 8 to run. Each one carriers an old bi-plane and 4 cannons.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/bomber)$(l)Bombing Run/$$(br)One of the old bi-planes takes of and prepares to drop its payload, bombing up to $(l)3 Tiles/$ in a $(l)2 by 4 area/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)6 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)$(l)Old But Gold/$$(br)The two ships have always had each others back. Their strong bond and long history provide a whopping $(l)10 extra tiles/$ for your fleet to use.
pages.title: Passive Ability
